question: Hair Trasnplantation is allowed or not
answer:
QUESTION
Can you please specify whether the transplantation of hair ... that is > installing an almost permanent wig ... in line with the Islamic > doctrines ... > > I am confused since I had a transplant and now is confused about its > stnding in Shariah ... > > > > Please guide or refer to a relvant source ...
ANSWER


Share:
It will be sinful to use the hair of humans. However, the hair of animals or synthetic hair is permissible. (Ahsanul Fataawa vol.8 pg.75)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
